Package jparsec.graph

Creates charts using JFreeChart, SGT, VISAD, SurfacePlotter, and JMathPlot.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChartElement
    Creates a chart element to be later drawn by JFreeChart.
    ChartElement3D
    Creates a chart element to be later drawn by JMathPlot.
    ChartSeriesElement
    Creates a series for later use in JFreeChart.
    ChartSeriesElement3D
    Creates a series for later use in JMathPlot.
    CreateChart
    Creates a chart using JFreeChart or GILDAS.
    CreateChart3D
    A class to create 3d charts using JMathPlot visualization library.
    CreateDitaaChart
    A quick way to call ditaa.
    CreateGridChart
    Creates grid charts (x-y maps with the variation of a third variable in color levels).
    CreateJZY3DChart
    A class to create 3d charts using JZY3D library visualization library.
    CreateSurface3D
    Creates a surface plot using the SurfacePlotter library by Eric Aro and Yanto Suryono.
    CreateVISADChart
    A class to show cubes of data and surfaces using VisAD.
    CreateVISADIsoSurfaceChart
    A class to show cubes of data in iso-surface mode using VISAD.
    DataSet
    A class to perform useful operations with datasets.
    DitaaBoxElement
    A handy class to store boxes for a ditaa diagram.
    GridChartElement
    Creates a grid chart element to be later drawn by NOAA SGT graphic library, or SurfacePlotter.
    GridSpectrumVISADChart
    A Grid chart showing integrated intensity and the spectrum in a given map position at the right.
    JPARSECStroke
    A class to support basic strokes, but adding serialization support.
    SimpleChartElement
    Creates a simple chart element for JFreeChart.
    SkyChart
    An interactive sky chart element.
    SpectraChart
    Implements a panel to show 30m and lmv spectra for different sources and molecules.
    TextLabel
    This class is designed to bundle together all the information required to draw short Strings with subscripts and superscripts.
    VISADChart
    A VISAD chart element consisting on a grid chart, a VISAD cube, and the control panel, to show in detail a 3d cube of data.
    VISADCubeElement
    A class to create a cube of data to be shown with VISAD.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ChartElement.SUBTYPE
    The set of subtypes for X-Y charts.
    ChartElement.TICK_LABELS
    The set of tick labels types.
    ChartElement.TYPE
    The set of chart types.
    ChartSeriesElement.POINTER_ANGLE
    The set of locations for the pointers.
    ChartSeriesElement.REGRESSION
    The regression types.
    CreateChart.GILDAS_LEYEND
    The set of positions for the leyend in Gildas charts.
    DitaaBoxElement.TYPE
    The different types of shapes.
    GridChartElement.COLOR_MODEL
    The different color models for SGT library.
    GridChartElement.OPACITY
    The set of possible opacities, if this chart is rendered using VISAD.
    GridChartElement.TYPE
    The different chart types for SGT library.
    GridChartElement.WEDGE_BORDER
    The possible borders for the wedge.
    GridChartElement.WEDGE_ORIENTATION
    The possible orientations for the wedge.
    GridSpectrumVISADChart.COORDINATES
    The set of coordinate types.
    TextLabel.ALIGN
    The set of align values.
    TextLabel.DOUBLE_FORMAT
    The possible formatting for doubles.
    VISADCubeElement.UNIT
    The set of units for the axis of the cube.

Package jparsec.graph Description

Creates charts using JFreeChart, SGT, VISAD, SurfacePlotter, and JMathPlot.

This package provide shortcut tools to create charts with easy using JFreeChart, SGT, VISAD, SurfacePlotter, JMathPlot, Jzy3d, and ditaa libraries.
